quotes.author: Nick Bostrom
quotes.work: Are You Living in a Computer Simulation?
quotes.quote: At least one of the following propositions is true.

quotes.author: Thomas C. Schelling
quotes.quote: My topic is the interdependent decisions of adversaries.

quotes.author: Robert J. Aumann
quotes.quote: Human misery is staggering: wars, disease, poverty.

quotes.author: Reinhard Selten
quotes.quote: Models simplify reality; their validity must be assessed.

quotes.author: John C. Harsanyi
quotes.quote: Game theory analyzes strategic interaction among rational players.
